content: **the potato doodle cowl** this doodle chart expansion started as a ridiculous version of an **april fools joke for 2024** fangirl fibers 1 yarnaceous fibers 2 and i all decided to create a spoof-like doodle inspired by our favorite potatoes and now you get to knit them **but it s totally a real pattern and it s free ** this is a doodle series pattern 3 which means the micro charts are intended to be used as mix-and-match colorwork motifs throughout your project **10 doodle motifs** included are russet potatoes sweet potatoes mashed potatoes baked potatoes french fries crinkle fries waffle fries potato chips hashbrowns and tater tots **potato-inspired yarn kits** available by fangirl fibers 4 and yarnaceous fibers 5 **not sure where to start ** check out the ultimate guide for how to doodle with yarn 6 for an helpful overview or download the free doodle workbook 7 for an in depth walkthrough with worksheets tutorial links and resources **sharing** #potatodoodlecowl & @pacificknitco **size s ** adult small medium large **measurements** height 12 in 30 cm circumference 20 24 28 in 50 60 70 cm **yarn** any dk light worsted or sport weight yarn suggested yarn potato doodle cowl kit by yarnaceous fibers 8 and fangirl fibers 9 merino dk base 100% superwash merino wool 100 g skeins 231 yards 211 m yardage listed in total yards per size due to the customizable nature of this pattern *340 400 465 yards 311 366 425 meters *approx 1 100g skein main color and 3-6 20g skeins accent colors or *approx 5-6 50g skeins for all colors **needles** main fabric us 5/3 75 mm or size to obtain gauge ribbing us 4/3 5 mm or one size smaller than gauge 24 or 32 in 60 or 80 cm circular needles depending on size selected **gauge** 24 sts and 24 row per 4 in 10 cm in colorwork **notions** 5 6 7 removable stitch markers one in different color scissors & tapestry needle 1 https //www fangirlfibers com bg_ref=fxqyxsysxi 2 https //yarnaceousfibers com bg_ref=uzqflirumz 3 https
